name: The Executable Update
summary: First version compiled to C++, with some small features

new_features.title: Continue Message button
new_features.description: Users can now press the continue message button on the latest AI message, input instructions optionally that guide the AI on how to continue the message, and the LLM will continue where it left off.

new_features.title: Update/Blogs
new_features.description: Introduced Update/Blogs buttons in the main menu, which retrieve the latest update log/blogs posted about LocalChatting.

improvements.title: Chat history assembly
improvements.description: The chat history prompt has been fully reworked, it was using legacy code in prior versions and was behaving incorrectly, sometimes leaving out messages/mixing up message order. LLM responses should be way clearer with referencing history.

improvements.title: Debug Menu Piechart
improvements.description: A basic piechart detailing how available tokens are distributed, useful for testing.

improvements.title: Multiple Fixes/Stability Changes
improvements.description: The process of moving the app's data accessing from the local app's directory which no longer exists to the user's documents folder has been challenging, but it's also given a lot of opportunity to refine on older parts of the codebase, alot of functions have had oversights fixed and should error less often.
